name: Last Stand (abductedPlatypus)
description:
A little game made in a weekend. In the style of an old LCD game, like game and watch. 

Z and X to move Left and Right

N and M to Slash and Block

Enter to start

At startup the highscore is shown.

It was extremely fun to make because of the limitations of old LCD games. Only black and white animations, one sprite at a single spot and color only as back and front.

I used the colors similarly simple as in game and watch games, similar sounds (only one channel) and made sure LCD was far enough from each other to actually work.
